text: Mbe mba tɨvar Zisas ga mbuav kim, mɨn thugim, ra ndav shɨrigim, mben bigi ndiv thɨgar mbai buaa degi gumgi wari fugi. Mbe buaa degi gumgi khare, mben gumgi ruu gum, mba Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari gumgir pani gum, mba Zudaiŋ tɨvir vhuuiŋ kaŋgi gumgi. Mbe wari fugim, mba Fhe Bakɨme phena gari gɨɨtɨvi, mbe Zisasan kov mben han vuim, mbe khaŋ ana nzuai,
